name: CellFormer
description:
I wanted to make games, this for me is just a warmup, to get the feel of the Godot engine. My First ever finished game Cellformer. CellFormer 2 will be a possibility including | better art: more of a story: more levels: and better gameplay | 

This Project was made in gd script not near its full potential.

All Features CellFormer has | moving floor, lava, parkour, 5 levels and 99% complete gameplay. 

Instead of complaining about the game, recommend features for the possible Cell Former 2.

I am aware the level thing does not work
